title: [skript]如何将颜色储存进yaml文件内？
txt_content:
尝试使用以下代码储存，能正常加载，但运行时报错：
sk:
command /test <color>:
        trigger:
                load "test.yml" as "test"
                set yaml value "color" in "test" to arg
                save "test"复制代码
log:
[21:16:50] [Server thread/INFO]: [Skript] Reloading test.sk...
[21:16:50] [Server thread/INFO]: [Skript] Successfully reloaded test.sk.
